Name: Merry Widow Fizz
Ingredients: 1 barspoon Powdered sugar (white sugar ground in mortar and pestle) or use 5ml of 2:1 sugar syrup per spoon
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass (no ice). TOP with soda.
Review: Rich berry balanced by citrus and charged with soda to fizz. The egg white ensures a lasting thick foaming head.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stan Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Bar Guide .
